events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified the customer's issue as a refund request based on the message content mentioning return and refund.
The refund support agent has been assigned to handle this case and assist the customer with their refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help with your refund for the jacket that doesn't fit. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund efficiently, could you also confirm if the jacket is unused and still has the original tags attached?
Order number is 123456789. Yes, the jacket is completely unused and still has all the tags attached just like it came.
Thanks for the information. Please send the jacket back using our prepaid shipping label, which I will email to you shortly, and once we receive it, we will refund your full purchase amount.
Great, thank you! I appreciate the quick help and look forward to receiving the shipping label.
I have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed immediately. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
We just wanted to follow up and ensure you received the refund for your returned jacket. Please confirm if everything is in order.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for the prompt resolution and excellent customer service!
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
I completed the survey and rated the service as excellent. Thank you for making the refund process so easy.
The refund case has been closed following successful resolution and positive customer feedback on the service provided.
This case has been archived as no further action is expected and the issue has been fully resolved.
